structure.unit: A HOSPITALIZATION OF THE MENTALLY ILL

law.history: Repealed also, 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 445, sec. 44, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 150, effective July 1, 1982.

metadata.lrc-note: . This section was repealed in 1982 Acts, Chapter 445, which contains the following language in Section 45 of that Act: "This Act shall become effective on July 1, 1982." The Ky. Constitution, in Section 55, requires that a reason be set forth for the emergency. However, no reason is set forth in this Act. The effective date for 1982 Acts with no emergency provision is July 15, 1982.
metadata.note: . 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 1 amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 153, changing the effective date of that enactment to July 15, 1984, and 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 445, sec. 44 repealed this section effective July 15, 1982. See also repeal set out in 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 1, effetive July 13, 1984.
